articles.content: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen declared Friday the US economy had achieved a long-sought soft landing, a historically unusual event in which high inflation is tamed without significantly damaging th… [+162 chars]

articles.author: Angela Mae
articles.title: Today's mortgage rates fall for 30-year terms - Fox Business
articles.description: Mortgage rates fluctuate almost daily based on economic conditions. Here are today’s mortgage rates and what you need to know about getting the best rate.
articles.content: The interest rate on a 30-year fixed-rate mortgage is 6.500% as of January 5, which is 0.250 percentage points lower than yesterday. Additionally, the interest rate on a 15-year fixed-rate mortgage i… [+12877 chars]
